tags: Value for money,
review: Went for treatment of my tooth ache..doctor checked my teeth for a minute and suggested for a minor surgery.. While there is no question to comment on the diagnosis of the experienced doctor like him, I was disappointed with his attitude because after his one minute's inspection he became busy with other works instead of giving proper attention to my quarries and concerns.. So, I am not questioning on his treatment but the service was not value for money considering his fee of Rs 900.

review: I reached the clinic before my appointment time, and was called in promptly. The doctor was clear and concise in his advice, and I was done before my original appointment time even came around. I would recommend both the clinic and the doctor!
